wikipedia_page.main: Jane Griffiths (born 1970) is a British poet and literary historian.

response: *Jane Griffiths (born 1970), English poet and literary historian
*Eric Gregory Award: Sue Butler, Cathy Cullis, Jane Griffiths, Jane Holland, Chris Jones, Sinéad Morrissey, Kate Thomas
*1996: Sue Butler, Cathy Cullis, Jane Griffiths, Jane Holland, Chris Jones, Sinéad Morrissey, Kate Thomas
* Eric Gregory Award: Sue Butler, Cathy Cullis, Jane Griffiths, Jane Holland, Chris Jones, Sinéad Morrissey, Kate Thomas

N. Herbert · Jackie Kay · Ian Duhig · Elizabeth Garrett · Linda France · Anne Rouse · Moniza Alvi · Stephen Knight · Katie Donovan · Chris Greenhalgh · Ann Sansom · Tracy Ryan · Maggie Hannan · Gwyneth Lewis · Julia Copus · Eleanor Brown · Tracey Herd · Katrina Porteous · Roddy Lumsden · Gillian Ferguson · Jane Holland · Jackie Hardy · Clare Pollard · Frieda Hughes · Nick Drake · Amanda Dalton · Christina Whitehead · Polly Clark · Joanne Limburg · Jane Griffiths

His artwork has been used for cover images by publishers Faber and Faber (Plays by David Farr) Bloodaxe Books (Poems by Jane Griffiths)  and also within various art publications. L-13 Light Industrial Workshop produced a limited edition hand printed book with Litten in 2012.
